Nightlight/Trinity/Windlord::

"What?" said Nightlight's shocked.


"Will you teach me  to fight, Uncle Aerotaur?" said happily 
Trinity "Yoooohoooo!!!!"

"Are you sure that it's good idea???" said Nightlight to Aerotaur.

"I can't see other way"replied Windlord..

Trinity was jumping around happily and when she see Parpertron she 
said "What's happen with you friend ? " she looked to Partpertron and 
she said "what's that?"

OOC: Orchid with what thing Papertron are aimming Trinity?
